section.name: Features
section.p: The Apache Portals Jetspeed Team is pleased to announce the final release of the Jetspeed-2 Open Source Enterprise Portal. This final release is fully-compliant with the Portlet Specification 1.0 (JSR-168). Jetspeed-2 has passed the TCK (Test Compatibility Kit) suite and is fully CERTIFIED to the Java Portlet Standard.

ul.li: Fully compliant with Java Portlet API Standard 1.0 (JSR 168)
